title: Later letters of Marcus Dods, D. D. (late principal of New college, Edinburgh) (1895-1909)
author: Dods, Marcus
snippet: I hope to be allowed to go to-morrow to Marshall Meadows, and while there I could do a little reading for Expositor ' Survey ' if you have any nice books lying for it.

title: Early Travellers in Scotland. Edited by P. Hume Brown. [With maps.]
author: Brown, Peter Hume.
